Summary: Start-like object, a bright point of light.
divs: sighting details this looks like a very bright point of light, a point like object. i observed it with bynoculars and still it was a very bright point of light, very low, very close to the florida turnpike in area code 33176 or 33186. very visible around 8:10pm, but later after dark it was really bright, like a very high street light, many people should have seen this. i manage to get many minutes of footage from a hd camcorder on a tripod, amazing view. i have seen this object many times before, this is sighting number nine since 07\22\13. i am attaching part of this footage.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There was one other sighting in Miami on or around August 9th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
